books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story of decadence and excess, The Great Gatsby is set among New York's elite during the Roaring Twenties.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society, warning of the dangers of government overreach and surveillance.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel following the emotional development of Elizabeth Bennet, who learns not to judge by first impressions.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy novel about the adventures of hobbit Bilbo Baggins, who embarks on a quest to help a group of dwarves reclaim their homeland.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A powerful story of racial injustice and the loss of innocence in the American South.
